name: Givaudan Active Beauty - Microbiome Solutions
description: Givaudan Active Beauty offers innovative microbiome solutions including Revivyl™ and other actives designed to activate, protect, or balance skin microbiota. Their research-driven approach focuses on supporting the skin's natural microbial ecosystem for enhanced skin health, renewal, and protection.
notes: Givaudan is a major fragrance and flavor company with strong Active Beauty division. Revivyl™ speeds up skin renewal through microbiome support. Focus on three mechanisms: activate, protect, and balance skin microbiota.
